summary: Ranch owner Katie Elder's four sons determine to avenge the murder of their father and the swindling of their mother.
cast: John Wayne|Dean Martin|Martha Hyer|Michael Anderson Jr.|Earl Holliman|Jeremy Slate|James Gregory|Paul Fix|George Kennedy|Dennis Hopper|Sheldon Allman|John Litel|John Doucette|James Westerfield|Rhys Williams|John Qualen|Rodolfo Acosta|Strother Martin|Percy Helton|Karl Swenson|Glen Anderson|Jerry Gatlin|Harvey Grant|Loren Janes|Boyd 'Red' Morgan|Chuck Roberson|Ralph Volkie|Paul Whitson|Jack Williams|Henry Wills|Joe Yrigoyen
title: Los cuatro hijos de Katie Elder
